overview: Yossi has over 20 years experience in senior management, and has held various executive positions in the medical devices industry. Mr. Aldar was the Managing Director of the Israeli subsidiary of Versamed, a US company developing and marketing ventilators. Mr. Aldar was a founder, CEO and Director of Flight Medical, a manufacturer of advanced portable self-contained ventilators. Prior to that Mr. Aldar held various positions in Oridion Medical and was a Section Leader at the Bio-Medical Engineering Branch, Surgeon General HQ, Israel Defense Forces. Mr. Aldar holds a BSc in Mechanical Engineering, a MSc. in Biomedical Engineering, and a Certificate in Senior Business Management, from Tel-Aviv University.
